Create a tilemap from the gfx map.

Parameters:
params The tilemap params.
desc The map description.
importance The tile map importance notice.
gfxMap The gfxmap to make a tile map from. This gfxMap can be changed if it contains e.g. self-intersecting polygons.
Returns:
A new tile map.
